name: RPG Dice Roll
description:
RPG DICE ROLL is the easiest RPG dice roller. Just select the number of d4, d6, d8, d12, d20 and d100 and tap a button. A fast tool for every RPG session.

- Easy tool for every player
- Low battery consumption
- Disable the auto-lock feature on your device and use this app during all the game session (Settings > General > Auto-Lock > Never)

Ready for Apple Watch.
